title: Good nevves for all Christian souldiers. Or The way to overcome the devill by the bloud of the lambe. As it was delivered in a sermon / by John Eachard, pastour of Darsham in Suffolke. Published according to order.
author: Eachard, John, 17th cent.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Matthew Simmons in Aldersgate-streete.,
